name: Magnetiseur (IAPSOP)
content:
Magnetiseur (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Magnetiseur Summary  From Pat Deveney's database: Magnetiseur, Le. Journal du Magnetisme Animal. 1859-1872 Monthly Geneva, Switzerland. Language: French. Editor: Charles Lafontaine. 1/1, April 15, 1859-1872. 16 pp., 5-10 francs, depending on destination. As its name indicates, the journal was primarily devoted to magnetism, but it was also one of the forums for the discussions over spiritualism and the postulated causes of its effects. Crabtree 807. Universitat Zurich. Google Books. Issues:Magnetiseur V1-3 1859-1862 Magnetiseur V4-6 1863-1865 Magnetiseur V7-9 1866-1869 Magnetiseur V10-12 1870-1872
